author: Choo Han Teck J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Mohd Halmi bin Hamid and Another v Public Prosecutor
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Choo Han Teck J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Aqbal Singh (Unilegal LLC) and R Gupta (A Zamzam and Co) for the first appellant; Ismail Hamid (Ismail Hamid and Co) and Zaminder Singh Gill (Hilborne and Company) for the second appellant; Cheng Howe Ming and Deborah Tan (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Statutory offences/Misuse of Drugs Act/Trafficking in controlled drugs/Whether offence made out/Whether knowledge of identity of intended recipient of drugs essential requirement of offence/Whether presumption of trafficking under s 17 of Act may be used in conjunction with presumptions of possession under s 18 of Act/Sections 17, 18(1), 18(2) Misuse of Drugs Act (Cap 185, 2001 Rev Ed)
